['Jamel Toppin for Forbes, Getty Taylor Hill/Getty Images, Dean MacKenzie for Forbes, Bill Pugliano/Getty Images, Chris Jackson/Getty Images', 'The Forbes Worldâ\x80\x99s Billionaires list is a snapshot of wealth using stock prices and exchange rates from March 11, 2022. Some people become richer or poorer within days of publication. We list individuals rather than multigenerational families who share fortunes, though we include wealth belonging to a billionaireâ\x80\x99s spouse and children if that person is the founder of the fortune. In some cases we list siblings or couples together if the ownership breakdown among them isnâ\x80\x99t clear, but here an estimated net worth of $1 billion per person is needed to make the cut. We value a variety of assets, including private companies, real estate, art and more. We donâ\x80\x99t pretend to know each billionaireâ\x80\x99s private balance sheet (though some provide it). When documentation isnâ\x80\x99t supplied or available, we discount fortunes. For daily updates of net worths, go to www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires.', "Special thanks to CBRE, FactSet Research Systems, LCH Investments, Orbis by Bureau Van Dijk, PitchBook Data, Real Capital Analytics, S&P Capital IQ, VesselsValue and the other experts who helped us with our reporting and valuations, including George de Benedicty, Ocala Ranches; Ben Bienvenu, Stephens; Jurgen Brauer, Small Arms Analytics; Sebastian Bray, Berenberg; Jonathan Chappell, Evercore ISI; Rommel T. column6: ['Clive Palmer during a press conference called to announce that he would not seek re-election in the... [+] House of Representatives at Parliament House on May 4, 2016 in Canberra, Australia. (Photo: Stefan Postles/Getty Images)', 'BY LUCINDA SCHMIDT', 'Flamboyant mining mogul Clive Palmer is back with a bang. He returns to the list of Australia’s 50 richest for the first time since 2014 with an estimated fortune of $1.8 billion, placing him at No. 20. It’s also his debut as a billionaire, thanks to court-ordered royalty payments from CITIC Pacific Mining’s huge Sino Iron project in Western Australia.', "This story is part of Forbes' reporting on\xa0Australia's\xa050\xa0Richest 2019. See full coverage\xa0here.", 'Coal baron Chris Wallin also returns to the list, at No. 41, bucking the trend that saw most mining fortunes fall. While Gina Rinehart retains her position as the country’s richest person, her estimated net worth fell by $1.8 billion, or 10.8%, to $14.8 billion on faltering iron-ore prices. Likewise, her four children, led by eldest daughter Bianca Rinehart, lost $1.9 billion, or 38% of their combined estimated wealth—the biggest drop in both dollar and percentage terms. That pushed them down to the 11th spot, from No. 5.', 'Overall, 22 fortunes fell, partly because of the Australian dollar’s 8.7% drop against the U.S. dollar since the last Australian rich list, in November 2017. Of the 23 fortunes that rose, the biggest gain—in dollar and percentage terms—went to Atlassian founders Mike Cannon-Brookes and Scott Farquhar, up $3 billion each, or 88.2%. Their $6.4 billion fortunes put them in a tie for fifth place, up five spots. Australia’s other tech billionaire, WiseTech Global founder Richard White, jumped 16 places to No.17, after his fortune swelled by $950 million, or 76%, to $2.2 billion.', 'The tech kings are 3 of 35 individual billionaires, one fewer than our last list. Just six women are billionaires, from a total of seven on the entire list, the same as in November 2017.', 'Only one new entrant joined the list this year: financial-services whiz Michael Heine, cofounder of investment platform Netwealth. Since its November 2017 IPO, Netwealth’s share price has more than doubled, placing Heine at No. 50 on the list, with an estimated fortune of $750 million. And Computershare founder Chris Morris returns to the list at No. 49, with $760 million, after missing the $700 million cutoff last time.', 'Four depart the list, including 96-year-old property billionaire Stanley Perron, who died in November and left the bulk of his $2.3 billion in assets to the Stan Perron Charitable Foundation. Flight Centre founder Graham Turner, property developer Tim Roberts, and Chris Thomas, founder of Adelaide-based meat processor Thomas Foods, fell below the $750 million cutoff.', 'METHODOLOGY', 'The list was compiled using information from the individuals, stock exchanges, analysts, private data bases, government agencies and other sources. Net worth numbers were based on stock prices and exchange rates as of the close of markets January 11. Private companies were valued by using financial ratios and other comparisons with similar companies that are publicly traded. The estimates include a spouse’s wealth, and where the person is the company founder, they also include the wealth of sons and daughters that’s derived from that company. In cases in which the fortunes of family members are based on the same company, we combine these members into one listing, as long as each of them has enough wealth to qualify for the list on his or her own.', 'Additional reporting on valuations by Kathleen Chaykowski, James Dunn, Antoine Gara, Nicole Lindsay and Jennifer Wells.', '']

column6: ['fter contracting in 2020, Hong Kong’s economy revived with a 6.4% rise in 2021 on an uptick in exports and domestic consumption. But strict curbs brought on by the city’s zero-tolerance policy toward Covid-19 impacted the benchmark Hang Seng index, which declined 16% in the past 12 months. Under such mixed circumstances, the combined wealth of the city’s 50 richest dipped slightly at $328 billion from $331 billion last year. More than half of the listees saw their wealth increase, led by the top three. ']

column6: ['Everyone knows Donald Trump is rich. But how about the 25 people jockeying to replace him as president? Forbes dug into the details—examining financial disclosure statements, scouring local real estate records and calculating pension benefits—to figure out the finances of the 2020 candidates. ', 'There were some surprises. Bernie is a millionaire. So is “middle-class Joe” Biden. Elizabeth Warren is richer than both of them, worth an estimated $12 million. But she’s a long way from John Delaney, whose $200 million fortune makes him twice as wealthy as every other Democratic candidate not named Tom Steyer or Michael Bloomberg. ', 'Aside from Trump, Steyer and Bloomberg, the average net worth is $12.9 million—the same as it was for the 2016 contenders. The median net worth is $2 million. The poorest is Pete Buttigieg, who has an estimated $100,000—or about 0.003% of Trump’s fortune. ', 'We reached out to the candidates. No one, not even the Democrats who spend the most time bashing Trump for his financial dealings, answered every question. So we ranked the entire field on transparency, assigning scores ranging from 0 (lips sealed) to 5 (full disclosure). In the end, we uncovered the money, regardless of whether the candidates wanted it out in the open. ', '', '', 'In November, former New York City mayor Michael Bloomberg joined a dozen other Democrats aiming to unseat Donald Trump. He has the money to compete, thanks to an 88% stake in financial information company Bloomberg LP, which generates an estimated $10 billion in annual revenue and throws off piles of cash. Bloomberg used $250 million of his own money running for mayor three times, and he has funneled $8 billion into philanthropic and activist causes, including fighting climate change and guns.', '', 'The billionaire-in-chief is rich enough to fund his entire presidential campaign by himself. Not that he will. While donors around the country have been pitching in to support his reelection effort, the richest president in American history has donated exactly $0 of his own, according to the latest filings.', '', 'After years of backing other Democrats, the hedge funder is trying his own luck as a candidate. Money won’t be an issue. Steyer founded Farallon Capital in 1986 and turned it into one of the largest hedge fund firms in the country. He stepped back in 2012 to focus on politics and philanthropy, concentrating his early efforts on protecting the environment. That struck some people as odd, given that he had previously invested in the fossil-fuel industry. Oil tycoon Harold Hamm, a prominent Trump supporter, once called Steyer “the world’s biggest hypocrite.” For his part, Steyer said he had a change of heart and divested his old fossil-fuel holdings. ', '', '', 'Delaney made a fortune in the business world before serving three terms in Congress. The son of a union electrician, he launched HealthCare Financial Partners, a lender to health care businesses, in 1993. One of his major backers: Tom Steyer, whose hedge fund invested $25 million. Delaney took HealthCare Financial Partners public in 1996 and pocketed $30 million when he sold it three years later to Heller Financial (later rolled into GE Capital). He quickly founded a second company, commercial lender CapitalSource, raising $542 million to launch it—$190 million of it from Steyer’s firm.', '', 'The Democratic senator got millions working for Republican megadonor Philip Anschutz. After serving in the Justice Department during the Clinton administration, Bennet left Washington in 1997 to join the Anschutz Investment Company. There, he worked on a deal to merge three movie theater chains into Regal Entertainment Group and ultimately joined its board of directors. Today his assets include hedge fund holdings and Colorado real estate.', '', '', 'Teachers aren’t paid so poorly after all—at least not Harvard professors. Warren and her husband, Bruce Mann, both longtime instructors at the university, have built up a small fortune through years of teaching, writing and consulting. Their largest holdings include TIAA and CREF accounts—available to educators and nonprofit employees—worth more than $4 million. One of their best investments has been their home in Cambridge, Massachusetts, purchased in 1995 for $447,000. It’s now worth an estimated $3 million. ', '', '', '', '“Middle-class Joe” is now solidly upper class. The former vice president and his wife, Jill, earned more than $15 million in the two years after they left the White House, cashing in on a multi-book deal with publisher Flatiron. In 2017, they dropped $2.7 million on a 4,800-square-foot pad in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware. The next year, they paid off a mortgage on their other home, in Wilmington, Delaware. ', 'Senator Harris married lawyer Douglas Emhoff in 2014, creating a California power couple. She brought the clout, and he brought the money. Since then, they have raked in $8.2 million—most of it from Emhoff’s work at law firms Venable and DLA Piper. The couple owns homes in Los Angeles, Washington, D.C. and San Francisco, worth a combined $5.8 million before debt.', '', '', 'Sestak graduated second in his class at the U.S. Naval Academy in 1974 and retired as a three-star admiral three decades later. For his service, he gets roughly $120,000 every year for the rest of his life. That pension is worth nearly $1.5 million. Sestak has funneled his salary into a diversified portfolio, which includes more than $15,000 of Apple stock and at least $100,000 in Amazon shares. ', '', 'The former Texas congressman married into a rich family—his wife, Amy, is the daughter of an El Paso real estate tycoon—but only a small chunk of that wealth has trickled down to the couple. Their largest asset is a note held by Amy, worth $2.5 million, according to a campaign spokesperson. Beto holds a minority interest in a $2.5 million El Paso strip mall, which he got from his mother. ', '', 'Elizabeth Warren announces her bid for president on Feb. 9, 2019 in Lawrence, Massachusetts.', '', 'Mayor Bill de Blasio has spent most of his life in public service, but like the Oval Office occupant he hopes to replace, he owes his fortune to timely investments in New York City real estate. In 2000 de Blasio, who held a handful of city and federal jobs before being elected mayor, and his wife bought a 1,200-square-foot row house on a quiet Brooklyn block. Four years later, they picked up a 1,600-square-footer just down the road. Since then, real estate values have skyrocketed. Last year de Blasio collected $108,450 by renting out the two properties while he and his family live in Gracie Mansion, the mayor’s official residence.', '', 'Turns out, the socialist senator is a pretty successful capitalist. After running for president in 2016, Sanders inked three lucrative book deals that have brought him more than $2 million so far, catapulting him into the 1%. Since the 2016 election, he has shelled out $575,000 for a northern Vermont summer home and paid off a 30-year mortgage on his Burlington, Vermont, house—25 years early. ', '', '', 'Since 1988, Inslee has bounced back and forth between the Washington state government (serving as a legislator and now governor) and the federal government (representing Washington’s 4th district, then its 1st district). That’s made him eligible for an estimated $68,000 per year for life in state and federal pensions, an income stream worth around $750,000 in all. He owns a five-bedroom, $1 million home outside Seattle. ', '', '', 'A prosecutor turned politician, Klobuchar holds a plain-vanilla portfolio. Her retirement holdings include a federal pension worth an estimated $560,000, the result of 12 years in the U.S. senate. ', '', 'When the New Jersey senator arrived in Washington in 2013, he owned stock in companies like Netflix, Facebook and Amazon. He sold all of that within a year of taking office, putting the proceeds into checking and savings accounts. Today Booker’s portfolio includes a 2,800-square-foot house in Newark, where he served as mayor from 2006 to 2013, and a New Jersey state pension. His federal tax returns show average annual giving of 11%, higher than any of the other 14 candidates who have released their filings.', '', '', 'The governor of Montana is a small-time landlord. He owns 50% of a historic building in Helena, Montana, where he rents out two commercial spaces and one residential apartment. It’s in a convenient location for Bullock, just a mile down the road from his office at the state capitol. His stake is worth roughly $300,000 after debt. The rest of Bullock’s portfolio is mostly composed of retirement accounts.\xa0\xa0\xa0', '', 'Williamson made millions as a self-help guru and author (with books like the 1992 bestseller A Return To Love), but she hasn’t held onto most of the money. What she does have sits in mutual funds, money market accounts and cash accounts, along with a handful of publicly traded stocks like Apple, Home Depot and VF Corp. While Williamson is not likely to win the election, she’ll almost certainly make money off her campaign: In April, she released her latest book, A Politics of Love. ', '', '', 'Gillibrand owns a $350,000 home in Troy, New York, with her husband, Jonathan. She’s the breadwinner, earning $174,000 annually for serving in the senate. He made just $185,000 as a consultant and investor between 2007 and 2018, according to tax returns. Their most valuable asset appears to be Gillibrand’s federal pension, worth an estimated $450,000. ', '', "Moulton got a physics degree from Harvard, then joined the Marine Corps and served four tours in Iraq. Back Stateside, he used the G.I. Bill to get master's degrees from Harvard’s public policy and business schools, before running for Congress. His $1 million fortune is largely spread among mutual funds, index funds and a 2,750-square-foot condo in Salem, Massachusetts.", '', 'Joe Biden arrives for a campaign kickoff rally on May 18, 2019 in Philadelphia.', '', 'The son of Taiwanese immigrants, Yang left a corporate law gig to go into the startup world. In 2000 he cofounded Stargiving.com, a website that gave charitable donors the chance to meet celebrities. After it folded he went to work for small mobile software and healthcare companies, then became CEO of test prep business Manhattan Prep in 2006.\xa0Yang helped grow the company to $11 million in revenues before industry giant Kaplan bought it in 2009 for tens of millions.', '', 'Barack Obama’s former secretary of housing and urban development has more than $100,000 in cash accounts, plus stock in a handful of mutual funds. After Obama left office, Castro joined the faculty of the University of Texas’ school of public affairs. His $40,000-per-year university pension is worth about $110,000. He also owns a modest, 2,000-square-foot home in San Antonio, where he served as mayor from 2009 to 2014.', '', '', 'Gabbard invested in the cryptocurrency craze in 2017, buying between $2,000 and $30,000 worth of Litecoin and Ethereum, according to documents she filed with the government. By the time she turned in her most recent financial disclosure report, in July 2019, she had gotten rid of those investments. It’s not clear if she made money on them. Most of her fortune is tied up in an $865,000 home in Washington, D.C., which has an estimated $560,000 in debt against it.', 'Elected to the House of Representatives at 29 years old, Ryan has been earning a congressional salary for years. After getting a law degree in 2000, he briefly served in the Ohio state senate, then won his House seat in 2002. In 2013, Ryan married a public school teacher, who is still paying off her student loans, according to his most recent financial disclosure report.\xa0', '', 'Mayor Pete has enough money to live comfortably in the Midwest, but he’s still the poorest 2020 contender. Chalk that up to his age (at 37, he’s the youngest candidate), student loan debt and his decision to give up a lucrative McKinsey job to run for treasurer of his home state of Indiana in 2010. He lost but got a six-figure gig as mayor of South Bend two years later. Still, he and his husband, Chasten, a former teacher, disclosed between $100,000 and $230,000 in student loans. ', '', 'Get\xa0Forbes’ daily top headlines straight to your inbox\xa0for news on the world’s most important entrepreneurs and superstars, expert career advice, and success secrets.', '']

['Dedicated to the perfect sleep experience, the Pearce brothers dreamt up a mattress that would change the game forever, and thus Purple was born. As the color of royalty, and royalty is how they want their customers to feel when putting their heads down at night, Purple products are made with only the highest quality materials.\xa0', 'Their patented No Pressure Support and Purple Grid will not only give you the best sleep ever, but it’s also affordable, so you don’t have to break the bank for the comfort you deserve. Use our Purple promo codes, or keep your eyes open for Purple sales, to experience Purple online shopping\xa0hassle-free!\xa0', 'For no-pressure support for every body, everywhere, the Purple Grid was designed by the Pearce brothers to change the mattress game forever. Theirs is the only comfort technology that instantly and intelligently adapts to your body, offering soft comfort and firmer support exactly where you need it.\xa0Plus, you’ll stay cool with the integrated open-air channels, ensuring the sleep you’ve always dreamed of.\xa0', "You won't just find it in their mattresses, either. You can enjoy the support you know and love in the Purple plush pillow or a Purple seat pad, too. Don't wait and shop Purple online today and check back here for upcoming mattress sales!\xa0", 'Not only can you find your next favorite mattress at Purple, but you can also invest in the ultimate sleeping setup with their pillows, bedding, and accessories! Shop sleeping masks, pet beds, seat cushions, weighted blankets, a Purple mattress pad, and so many other premium products, such as the Purple mattress platform bed frame,\xa0for the best experience.\xa0', 'Not only are their sheets luxurious, but they’re also designed specifically for the mattress, with a stretchy fabric to keep all of your pressure points feeling light-as-air. Use one of our many Purple offers or Purple deals to try them out today!', 'If you love your Purple mattress, and they’re pretty sure that you will, it only makes sense that you want to share the news! Refer a friend, and once they buy their very own mattress using your referral link and our Purple coupon codes or Purple discount codes, you’ll both receive up to a $75 Amazon gift card! Share it through Twitter, instant message, SMS, or just tell a friend to benefit from this great Purple promo. Make sure you also share this page so they can save on the Purple mattress protector or a Purple brand pillow to complete the experience.\xa0', "No one can pass up a Purple mattress sale, and there's no better way to stay up-to-date than with us. Between their Purple mattress Black Friday blowout and Purple mattress Cyber Monday deals, if you're in the market for a better sleep, this is the best place to be. Sometimes, they'll even offer a special Purple mattress Labor Day sale or Memorial Day sale, which means that you'll never have to pay full price. Whether you're shopping for a Purple cushion or some luxurious Purple mattress sheets, we have you covered.", 'Knowing that testing a mattress can time some time, Purple offers a 100-night guarantee period so you can properly decide if it’s right for you. You may also try out their products at any of the verified Purple mattress retailers!\xa0', 'They ask that all customers spend up to 21 nights on their mattress before starting a return or exchange to let your body adjust to the amazing support your mattress has to offer. If you’re still not fully satisfied, they will offer a full refund and free pickup through the Purple mattress return policy; just call their customer care team to initiate the process and a specialist will help get things rolling.\xa0']

["Squarespace is a software as a service (SaaS) company that focuses on providing website-building tools to casual users. Known for their innovative interfaces and easy-to-use options, they're widely used by a range of customers, from corporations to individuals. Famous users include Hollywood actors Keanu Reeves and Winona Ryder, Chef Danny Bowien, fashion designer Sadie Williams, and even mascot Oscar The Grouch. If you're still unsure, just find the Squarespace contact information online and reach out to start your website journey today!", "Anyone can easily create a website using the visual drag-and-drop interface found at Squarespace.com! They even have ready-to-use Squarespace themes and templates, so you don't need to spend time creating one from scratch. If your website doesn't have a logo yet, you can use its excellent Squarespace logo maker to create one. Your Squarespace subscription offers many exciting features to make your website the best it can possibly be.", 'They also offer a suite of marketing tools to help promote your website. You can use search engine optimization (SEO) or the Squarespace Email marketing campaign feature to make your website more visible to people searching on Google. Check out these promo codes for Squarespace and start building your website today!', "With so many Squarespace subscriptions to choose from, it's no wonder you stopped here to find the best price. You'll only have to pay for what you really need, no matter if you're launching a personal portfolio, starting your own Squarespace clothing store,\xa0or looking at a Business Plan, Squarespace is fully customizable to meet your preferences. All of the Squarespace.com prices for their\xa0Personal, Business, Basic Commerce, and Advanced Commerce plans are available online.", "Remember that they also offer Squarespace gift cards if you're looking to boost someone special in your life. Whatever they choose, whether it's a standard plan or Squarespace Premium, your gift will be treasured for years to come.", "For new users, the service offers a Squarespace free trial with no credit card needed. The trial period lasts for 14 days and\xa0allows you to test the waters and see if their website tools and features are right for you. Once you're sold, they offer exclusive Squarespace yearly pricing to help you save. Choose their annual plan to enjoy a Squarespace discount of 30%.", 'If you’re looking for any Squarespace promo codes, Squarespace coupon codes, or Squarespace discount codes, the website doesn’t have many. They do, however, currently have their running\xa0Squarespace promo, which gives you 10% off any plan as a welcome offer. They claim it’s the best Squarespace deal you’ll ever get compared to other Squarespace coupons from other questionable sites.', 'Generally, you are free to cancel your subscription at any time. For annual plans, you can get a refund if you cancel your subscription within the first 14 days. All other plans, like monthly plans, cannot be refunded. Auto-renewal payments are also not valid for refunds.', 'Mobile Start Plans made using the Squarespace app are eligible for a refund through Apple.', 'For domain name registration, you can get a refund when you cancel your Squarespace domain five or fewer days from the registration date.\xa0', 'If you have any inquiries, Squarespace customer service is especially helpful.']

column6: ['Verizon is proud to support Americans with over 150 locations and as the second-largest phone provider in the United States. They were founded in 2000 and continuously strive to improve the way that its customers live. Verizon customer service is here to help you find the best plan and device for your lifestyle. Check their website for FAQ and other ways to connect with them.', 'Verizon uses CDMA networks with 4G LTE and 5G to help its customers connect every day. Don’t forget to use Verizon promo codes and Verizon coupons to save on your next phone or mobile plan.', 'Verizon prepaid plans make it easy to purchase a new phone online. Simply pick which Verizon prepaid phone you want and pay the Verizon prepaid price. You’ll get a waived activation fee, and your SIM card sent free in the mail. Enjoy even more Verizon deals when signing up for the AutoPay feature on your Verizon prepaid plans. All Verizon plans are suited to fit any customer. From unlimited plans to kids’ plans and international plans, use a Verizon promo code to save on devices for everyone!\xa0', "Between Verizon Messages and Ringback Tones, Visual Voicemail to NumberShare, Roadside Assistance, PopData, Verizon Cloud, and so many others, no matter what you need, Verizon is guaranteed to have an app for it! Explore recommended apps that can power your mobile life and suit your preferences best. Browse through useful apps like the Verizon Content Transfer app, use the Direct\xa0Carrier Billing app to charge purchases right to your account, check the Verizon coverage map from your area,\xa0and so much more. It's never been easier to stay connected than with Verizon!", "Never compromise on quality when you choose Verizon refurbished phones and other devices! With a total quality inspection, 90-day limited warranty, and total mobile protection eligibility, you can't go wrong with a pre-owned piece of tech. All refurbished Verizon cell phones\xa0are 100% fully-functional and rigorously tested so you only receive the best. As one of the best Verizon cell phone deals for existing customers, if you're browsing for Verizon iPhones for sale, or another top-selling brand of Verizon smartphones, look no further. Don't forget to use a Verizon promo code to cut down the cost even more.\xa0", 'Verizon internet with Fios Gigabit connection is sure to help your household browse and stream better than ever before! Take advantage of special Verizon promotions for prepaid Visa gift cards and free router rentals depending on how fast you need your connection! Get the best streaming and picture quality for streaming the game, researching for that next assignment, or working from home on your Verizon tablets!', 'Take advantage of Verizon trade-in to save on your next phone upgrade! Simply go online and let them know what type of phone you currently have and they’ll tell you the estimated trade-in value. Get a Verizon discount on your next purchase, a Verizon gift card,\xa0or opt to receive a PayPal credit immediately. Check for other Verizon offers on their website to see how you can save even more on your phone plan!\xa0', 'Shop for new smartphones with great deals and feel confident in your purchase by reading customer Verizon reviews on each phone that they offer! Check out their deals section for constant Verizon offers such as the Verizon Bring Your Own Device or one of their Verizon plans for seniors. They have BOGO deals, free subscription additions, and more Verizon sales for you to choose from! You may also sign up for the Verizon rewards program for exciting, members-only Verizon discounts and news on upcoming products.', "Upgrade your service carrier to experience quality care, the best devices, stress-free phone repair, an unlimited hotspot, and huge savings when you pick a plan with one of our Verizon coupons! You can even shop for useful accessories like a Verizon cell phone booster.\xa0No matter if you're looking for a new phone or just shopping around for Verizon plans, you can always enjoy amazing savings with sales, special offers and Verizon promo codes.", 'If you change your mind about Verizon prepaid phones or one of their Verizon accessories, the Verizon return policy makes it easy to accommodate. They will return or exchange your device and accessories within 30 days of the purchase. Keep in mind that some fees may apply to your return, so be sure to see their website for more information about their return policy and everything that’s involved.', 'Black Friday\xa0is the best time to score a great deal on a brand new smartphone or shiny new plan, and with Verizon Black Friday deals, you’ll save tons when you make the switch, upgrade your current contract, or take advantage of their Verizon add a line feature!', 'In previous years, Verizon offered its customers a serious way to save some cash: they offered $400 off the latest Apple and Android models, buy one get one free on the iPhone X or Samsung Galaxy S9, as well as $750 off any other iPhone model both in-store and online. Hopefully Verizon will provide a similar deal on the newest smartphones of the year, so make sure you keep your eyes open to score some awesome tech!', 'This is also a great opportunity to purchase Verizon Protect, allowing you to receive repairs, replacements, identify theft monitoring, and more for a fraction of the full cost. We can also expect great Verizon discounts on fun accessories like phone cases, headphones, PopSockets, and other essentials, so you can get a new phone with all the bells and whistles at a super-low price this Black Friday.']

['A yoga-inspired athletic apparel company that began as a design studio by day and a yoga studio by night, Lululemon is famous for its thoughtful designs and driven attitude.\xa0', 'More than just a store for people to buy gear to sweat in, Lululemon is a community hub where its customers can also learn about healthy living, mindfulness, and living a life full of possibility. Their founder, Chip Wilson, wanted designers that weren’t just talented artistically, but also athletically, so they could produce the highest quality gear that makes you want to sweat the second you put it on.', "Shop the We Made Too Much section, their Lululemon outlet, for the best items at an even lower Lululemon discount. Upgrade your movement and feel the difference their technology can make on your next workout or yoga session by taking advantage of a Lululemon sale or by using one of our many Lululemon coupons the next time you're looking to buy Lululemon online!", 'Always be ready for what comes next with the free smartphone\xa0app! Make checkout a breeze with your very own personal account, use the store locator so you can try on all of the new arrivals, add products to your Favorites list, keep up to date with the latest Lululemon deals, and look through all of the high-quality photos to see a product from every angle. Browse, discover, choose Lululemon gifts for your friends,\xa0and shop lightning-fast, all from their thoughtfully-designed app.', 'Make your workout attire stretch with you and your budget by shopping with a Lululemon coupon. With a wide selection of high-performance gear and accessories, you can find big savings up to 20% off with one of our many promotions available. Take a few Lululemon promo codes along with you next time you shop!', 'Test out their Silverscent fabric technology that makes it safe to sweat without the smell that comes with it so you can wear your favorite pair of Lululemon leggings in that hot yoga session without worry. Their Evonatural gear gives you the softest, most comfortable feeling combined with the performance capability you need.', 'Wear a pair of Lululemon shorts with Everlux when you need your clothing to wick away sweat and dry fast. Finally, of course, their famous Luon and Luxtreme fabrics contain four-way stretch, sweat-wicking technology, and that buttery soft feeling you know and love.', 'Take a look at individual product details for more information on fit, fabrics, care instructions, and more! No matter how you like to sweat, they have\xa0a solution to help you do it right. Browse through a few Lululemon reviews to see how others are moving in their gear, and once you’ve chosen your perfect products, save on style with one of our Lululemon coupon codes or by shopping the latest Lululemon leggings sale.', "Their quintessential Lululemon sale section, We Made Too Much offers the same quality merchandise at a more budget-friendly price! From their iconic Fringe Fighter headband to a pair of Wunder Under tights, you can shop your favorite styles without stressing about the high price tag with this Lululemon outlet online. If you're looking to snatch up some Lululemon on sale, this is the place to do so.", "Keep in mind that all Lululemon clearance items are final sale, so make sure you check their size charts and read a few reviews before finalizing those Lululemon yoga socks or headbands. Once you're ready to check out, grab a few Lululemon coupons to see just how much you can save on that athleisure style!", "We know just how much you love your Free to Flow Lululemon tights, but they also offer a wide variety of accessories to keep you focused and ready for anything! Take a look at Lululemon sports equipment such as yoga mats, belt bags, gloves, towels, and their signature Lululemon water bottles. If you're stuck on what to choose, consider browsing the Lululemon best sellers to see what other customers are raving about!\xa0", "As a design-led company, this brand is constantly seeking new ways to innovate their process, gear, and social impact to help the world go from good to great. A community built on the world's sweatiest leaders, The Sweat Collective offers special perks and benefits to athletes, studio workers, personal trainers, and instructors to help them do their jobs well, sweat more, and look great while doing it.\xa0", "Once you've applied for this Lululemon subscription, you'll get exclusive Lululemon coupons just for you, and will be the first to know about the latest gear, the greatest stories, and other cool news before anyone else just for being you. If you aren't an instructor, but still want a similar discount, consider joining the Lululemon newsletter for the latest news and offers.", 'Breathe easy with the super-simple Lululemon return policy: if something isn’t quite right, you can bring your items back for free in person or by mail. Quality is at the heart of who they are as a brand; if a product doesn’t do well in fabric, performance, or craftsmanship, they’ll take it back and make it right. Just contact their awesome Lululemon customer service team to start the process. You may do so either by toll-free phone number, going in-store, or through the Lululemon email.\xa0', "While they don't offer any Lululemon alterations, they do offer complimentary hemming on tops and pants at all of their stores.\xa0", 'Currently, they accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Lululemon gift card, and PayPal\xa0as valid forms of payment on all of your favorite merchandise like a durable Lululemon backpack, yoga mat, or tote bag. No matter how you pay for your next order, be sure to check out with a Lululemon promo code or Lululemon discount code.', 'Considering that, last year, passionate shoppers crashed their website trying to snatch up an amazing deal, the Lululemon Black Friday\xa0sale for 2022 is bound to be something good! As this Canadian-owned brand offers high-quality activewear at a more expensive price point, consider this your best chance to score a new workout wardrobe without hurting your bank account.', "Last year, they dropped discounts of up to 50% off on select collections including items from the Lululemon men's collection,\xa0womenswear, and accessories to keep things fresh. Although their website crashed and caused a little panic, this year we can only hope that they’ve upped their game and are ready for the slew of shoppers coming in hot.\xa0", 'Not sure what to go for? Definitely take a look at their leggings, outerwear, and various accessories to cut costs and try out something a little luxurious at a fraction of the full price, and keep your eyes open for any additional Lululemon Cyber Monday discounts!']

['A modern media company whose mission is to inspire you through the power of communication and entertainment, the AT&T business is dedicated to bringing you premium content, high-speed networks, and affordable phone plans for your everyday life.', 'They seek to reinvent the way their industry works for consumers, content creators, distributors, and advertisers all over the world. With the latest phones, fast networks, their dedicated AT&T customer service team, and a variety of plans available, AT&T remains America’s best network for a reason.\xa0', 'By shopping with AT&T, phones never have to cost a fortune; browse their deals or use one of our AT&T promo codes and upgrade to the latest tech at a reduced price.', 'Whatever your thing is, whether it’s being front row at a concert or ordering a pizza for game day, AT&T THANKS offers you more of it. You’ll receive insider access, exclusive AT&T deals, and the first look into upcoming AT&T sales on all the things you love. There’s no signup, point system, or catch— all of this is just their way of saying thanks.', "Sign in to your account to explore your personalized benefits on dining, music, entertainment, services, wi-fi hot spots, and more. You’ll always get expedited assistance when calling AT&T customer service, premium event access, VIP experiences, and special private AT&T discounts just for doing what you're already doing.", 'Now, staying on top of your AT&T phone plans has never been easier with the app for iOS and Android. You’ll be able to check data usage, pay your bills, upgrade your AT&T plans, and manage all of your AT&T coupons in one convenient location.', 'Get personalized on-the-go access to the full selection of AT&T THANKS benefits and deals with the specialized AT&T THANKS app to take advantage of AT&T promos whenever, wherever. You’ll never miss another bill payment, upcoming AT&T wireless deal, or changes to your plan ever again!', "With the AT&T Trade In program, you can receive up to $1000 off of select smartphones when you make the switch! Just select your device's model and answer a few questions, they'll send you shipping supplies at no extra cost, and you'll receive an AT&T prepaid card to use towards your next eligible device or plan.\xa0", "Take a look at current\xa0AT&T phones for sale, and with all of the money you'll be saving, consider picking up some AT&T Galaxy Buds for the ultimate experience. Don't forget to look into the AT&T Unlimited Plus plan for even more things to love.\xa0", 'Always there to lend a hand, the AT&T customer service number is available 7 days a week during regular business hours to solve all of your incoming problems, answer any outstanding questions, or work on making your service the best it can be. You may also reach their team through live chat, forums, and other social media for tech-based assistance.', 'Want to exchange your old device for a brand new one or shop AT&T prepaid phones? Their team is ready to help, and with our AT&T discount codes and AT&T coupon codes, you can upgrade to the plan of your dreams with no extra charge. You can never go wrong with their AT&T Pay As You Go plan!', 'AT&T treats its customers right, so when you purchase equipment and services directly from them such as an AT&T wi-fi extender, you’ll receive their no-hassle return policy and easy exchanges every time. The device must be in like-new condition with no physical or water damage along with the manufacturer’s original packaging and components.\xa0 To cancel your service, just give the AT&T Wireless customer service number a call to begin the process.', 'AT&T Black Friday deals make shopping super simple with online ordering, in-store expert advice, and at-home delivery to offer you a flawless experience and some amazing deals along the way. Land some cool gadgets, tech essentials, or even a brand new smartphone with a little help from Forbes on the biggest shopping day of the year.\xa0', 'In previous years, we’ve seen discounts like a $100 reward card alongside 6 months of Spotify premium when you purchase a TV and internet bundle, up to 75% off Apple iPhones, up to 86% off Samsung Galaxy phones, and up to 90% off LG smartphones to choose exactly what you want without worrying about the overall price. New and exciting customers alike can find something to love with their wide range of products, so if you’re in the market for a new plan or device, make the AT&T Black Friday sale\xa0your first stop this year!', 'From super-fast AT&T wireless\xa0internet to exclusive TV bundles, our AT&T promo codes\xa0can have you saving in no time. Choose a plan with unlimited data and endless entertainment for less. Use one of our many AT&T coupons that we have available, and save yourself a ton of money, and make sure you check out the AT&T Cyber Monday sale, too!\xa0', '']

['Being a good neighbor means being committed to delivering the right home improvement products with the best service and value across America. In 1964, Lowe’s began as a small neighborhood hardware store with a simple philosophy: to deliver superior customer service.', 'Looking to make sure that all customers feel welcome and receive the help they need, friendly staff is always available no matter if it is a complex project or a simple question. They believe that a big box store never means little service.', 'Shop Lowe’s lawn mowers, ceiling fans, dishwashers, bathroom vanities, or even a new suite of appliances\xa0all in one place online. Be sure to use a Lowe’s coupon code or Lowe’s discount code to shop Lowe’s sales and get the best deals possible and make your next project a breeze.', "When you're looking to transform your house into a home, sometimes all you need is one finishing touch, like a set of premium Lowe's kitchen cabinets or a brand new Lowe's washer and dryer. They offer a wide variety of high-quality homewares and essentials such as Lowe's toilets, all at a better price. By choosing Lowe's online for all of your home and garden needs, you can rest assured knowing that you can stay within your budget and still enjoy shopping the Lowe's paint sale or for some mood-enhancing Lowe's outdoor lighting.\xa0", 'Collaborate with Lowe’s hardware\xa0on your next project and make your dreams become reality. Their dedicated employees can help assemble a variety of items for you, load your larger objects into your vehicle, offer in-store consultation services, do color-matching to recreate that perfect shade in a matter of seconds, and can cut lumber, blinds, pipe, rope, chain, and more.\xa0', "Not only that, but they can have it\xa0at your door as soon as possible with Lowe's delivery and install your newly purchased Lowe's flooring or Lowe's hot water heater in no time at all. Looking for stress-free Lowe's carpet installation? You're in luck, as we have the best deals and discounts to help you book it for less.\xa0", "They are proud to offer a 10% Lowe’s military discount on eligible items every day to military personnel to help them load up their Lowe's tool boxes for less. Use this Lowe’s discount or one of our many other Lowe’s promo codes to purchase your next Lowe’s appliances, sheds, patio furniture, power tools, or some Lowe's mulch for the garden\xa0to get started on home improvement today. With a Lowe’s coupon, you can get so much done for so much less.", "For all of your home-related needs, look no further than our Lowe's coupons! Shop Lowe's paint,\xa0building supplies, home decor, and so much more with one of our promotions ready to help you save. Start your next project for less today with these Lowe's promo codes! You may also benefit from joining the my Lowe's program for exclusive email offers, special promotions, news on upcoming Lowe's sales,\xa0and inspiration.\xa0", "While they hope that you love your new dishwasher, Lowe's light fixtures, or power washer, if something isn’t working the way you’d like it to, they want you to be completely satisfied and will make it right. Simply return the merchandise to any Lowe’s store in new, unused condition within 90 days of purchase along with proof of purchase and they will complete refund or exchange.", 'Although their low prices allow Lowe’s customers to find deals every day, if you find an identical product from any local or online retail competitor with a lower price, they’ll match it no problem to make sure that you are getting the best price possible.']

['Being\xa0the first ready-to-wear fashion emporium in America, Brooks Brothers has shaped American style through fashion innovation, fine quality, personal service, and exceptional value. Their Brooks Brothers suits are some of the finest, most quality-made ones around, with a catalog of daily wear to match.', 'While they don’t offer a Brooks Brothers outlet collection just yet, you can still shop at reduced prices using a Brooks Brothers promo code or Brooks Brothers coupon. Be sure to browse through their men’s, women’s, kids’, home, and Brooks Brothers sale\xa0sections to experience it all.', 'Having made countless contributions to the clothing industry since 1818, the Brooks Brothers outlet maintains only the highest standards for quality manufacturing worldwide. For over two centuries they’ve set the standard for the finest American-made apparel, so every one of your treasured Brooks Brothers shirts or pair of Brooks Brothers shoes\xa0has been handcrafted with both care and consideration.\xa0', "Not just for men, the Brooks Brothers women's collection is just as high-quality and on-trend. They offer a wide selection of stunning Brooks Brothers dresses and Brooks Brothers women's suits\xa0fit for any occasion.", 'They use state-of-the-art technology, traditional techniques, and a high-skilled workforce to create their masterpieces; experience a taste of luxury for yourself through the use of a Brooks Brothers coupon code or Brooks Brothers discount code.', "The best place to stay up-to-date on the next Brooks Brothers suit sale is right here! We're always finding the best deals and uploading the latest sales to keep more money in your wallet. For the best discounts year-round, look no further than the Brooks Brothers outlet section.\xa0", "They also offer a variety of sales throughout the year to help you cut down the cost of your next Brooks Brothers red fleece shirt or a pair of Brooks Brothers women's boots. Check out their Brooks Brothers shirt sale to update your wardrobe for less, keep your eyes open for the next Brooks Brothers Labor Day sale, or wait for a Brooks Brothers Friends and Family sale for an even better discount.\xa0", 'As a Brooks Brothers rewards member, you’ll benefit from exclusive access to special Brooks Brothers clearance\xa0promotions throughout the year. Begin earning 2 points for every $1 spent, and once you reach 1000 points, you’ll receive a $10 Brooks Brothers promo code to use on a future purchase. As an Insider, you’ll also enjoy free shipping on qualifying orders, bonus point opportunities, and exclusive Brooks Brothers discounts.\xa0', 'Upgrade to the next tier for even more points, early access to Brooks Brothers sale offers, and the first look at new arrivals! Sign up for the Brooks Brothers credit card to earn those benefits even faster and receive additional Brooks Brothers deals.', 'Wanting you to be satisfied with your latest purchase, as per the Brooks Brothers return policy, they will gladly accept a return of saleable merchandise within 60 days of purchase. Please ensure that it’s in the original condition and accompanied by an original receipt.\xa0', "If one of the Brooks Brothers ties, t-shirts,\xa0men's shoes, or another product you have recently bought goes on sale, they will happily make a price adjustment if it is within 7 days of purchase; items during select promotional periods are exempt. Please contact the Brooks Brothers customer service team if you would like to request a Brooks Brothers price adjustment for any recently-purchased Brooks Brothers men's shirts or Brooks brothers suits.", "The Brooks Brothers Black Friday sale is the best time to get amazing deals on fantastic outfits for the whole family. Whether you're shopping for yourself or grabbing a Brooks Brothers gift card for friends and family, you can count on scoring the best price on this page! This year, you can expect to find up to 40% off the entire selection of men's and women's clothing including your next Brooks Brothers polo shirt or one of their\xa0Brooks Brothers dress shirts.", 'In previous years, customers have saved up to 50% off by bundling items in the Brooks Brothers Black Friday sale. Take advantage of the lowest prices on outerwear, and check out the Red Fleece collection for even more deals!']

column6: ['The American lifestyle brand that embodies the classic style and sensibility of its founder, Tory Burch is known for its colors, prints, and eclectic details that make it entirely unique. Inspired by art, music, travel, interiors, and her own stylish parents, every Tory Burch collection is thoughtfully designed and expertly crafted for only the highest of expectations.\xa0', 'Your next pair of iconic Tory Burch sandals, alluring fragrance, or designer handbag can be even more obtainable with a Tory Burch promo code or Tory Burch coupon code. Take style home with you today by shopping the Tory Burch outlet collection for style that just won’t quit.', 'Sign up for Tory Burch and Tory Sport emails to receive exclusive offers, news on upcoming Tory Burch sale events, 10% off your first purchase, and a special Tory Burch coupon during your birthday month. You’ll be the first to know about Tory’s must-haves and style guide, new arrivals before they drop, private sales on special deals only for you, and so much more.', "Take home a little designer fashion, fragrance, or a must-have handbag when you shop with our Tory Burch coupons! Known for offering effortless style, you can have a taste for yourself with huge savings like up to 20% off. You're never limited to the sales section— with our Tory Burch coupon codes, your wallet and wardrobe will thank you.", 'There’s always a new collection available at Tory Burch; bags, shoes, and more come alive in seasonal prints, beautiful embellishments, and intricate embroidery that echo the most coveted color palettes and trends. You’ll find timeless neutrals, soft pastels, bright colors, and bold prints all year long. For inspiration, style tips, interviews, and Tory’s take on the season, visit Tory Daily, their online magazine covering the latest topics on culture, apparel, entertainment, and travel.', 'Shop Tory Burch Sport for a modern approach on iconic seventies activewear reimagined in high-performance fabrics, fresh colors, and graphic prints. Inspired by athletes, this collection balances style with substance and is designed to reflect the beauty, grace, and strength of the game and empowering those who play.\xa0', 'Use one of our many Tory Burch promos or a Tory Burch discount to upgrade your sports apparel to something fashion-forward.', "Get inspired by all the latest trends and how-tos when you check out the Tory Daily section online. Here, you'll be sure to find great inspiration for how to put your new Tory Burch pieces to great use throughout your wardrobe and your home! Find great ways to save by using the Tory Burch sales section to find items like accessories for your favorite outfit or spruce up your favorite room in the house with the Tory Burch serving ware and candles!\xa0", "When you're eager to shop the look, be sure to check out the Tory Burch outlet sales online or in-store to make your dreams come to life! Between a Tory Burch crossbody sale or Tory Burch flip flops clearance, when you want to update your wardrobe of accessories, get inspired with their huge catalog.", "Shop the Tory Burch gift guide all year round to find the perfect gifts for birthdays, special occasions, and holidays. Check out their iconic Triple-Compartment Tote for the ladies in your life or the Embrace Ambition Bracelet. You'll also find great hostess gifts like their scented candles and unique dinnerware. Shop the Tory Burch outlet for additional sales on these one-of-a-kind items.", "Use the Tory Burch promo codes when you shop for the glowing bride-to-be in your life! The gift guide offers pieces that make the perfect gift for any bride. Whether it's a new Tory Burch perfume,\xa0Crystal-Pearl Stud Earrings, a stunning Tory Burch top,\xa0or a beautiful white leather sandal, you'll be sure to find the ideal item at the best deal!", 'For Tory Burch returns, they will gladly accept new, unused merchandise accompanied by a receipt free of charge within 30 days of delivery. They will also accommodate a one-time price adjustment on full-price items within 14 days of purchase. You may request it either online or at your local Tory Burch store.\xa0Currently, Tory Burch private sale, sample sale, select outlet items, and monogrammed products are final sale and are ineligible for a refund through the Tory Burch return policy.', 'Now that you’ve found that perfect pair of Tory Burch sunglasses or Tory Burch flats, complete your purchase by paying with American Express, Mastercard, Visa, Discover, PayPal, Apple Pay, Union Pay or gift card and a Tory Burch discount code.\xa0', 'If you need to contact the Tory Burch customer service team for any reason, they are available 7 days a week through live chat, text, email, or toll-free phone number for all of your questions or concerns.', 'Combining femininity, fun, and functionality, Tory Burch sells polished and well-crafted merchandise for anyone seeking a pop of color, a little sparkle, or something elegant for an upcoming cocktail party. Although it’s considered to be a designer brand, when you decide to shop their Tory Burch Black Friday\xa0sale, it’ll be even easier to bring home an exciting new handbag, a pair of shoes, or fun accessory to help you follow your fashion dreams.', 'Oftentimes, to help their customers save on everything they want, Tory Burch will offer a coupon code to save around 30% off most of their items, including new collections and old favorites. Even sale items are eligible to be discounted with this code, so\xa0we can only cross our fingers that a similar discount will return for 2022.', 'Occasionally, they release a limited-edition purse available only during the Tory Burch Black Friday\xa0sale, so make sure you check back frequently to score something one-of-a-kind! Stick with Forbes this upcoming Black Friday\xa0if you want to save big on bold fashion at Tory Burch.']

['Dr. Martens shoes have been classic, fashion staples for a myriad of music scenes and cultural revolutions. From funky, punk-rock platform boots, to beautifully crafted sandals, you can grab a pair or Dr Martens shoes for any time of the year!\xa0', "The 1460 is the iconic style of Dr. Martens black boots. However, since its inception, the brand has expanded to include other types of shoes as well. A Dr. Martens promo code will make these boots an accessible part of your wardrobe. Whether your style is more punk or glam, you won't regret working Dr. Martens’ comfortable, unique shoes into your closet.", "The Dr. Martens original style is a black boot that laces up above the ankle. It is best known for the yellow stitching around the shoe and the air cushioning in the sole. At first, the company only produced Dr. Martens men's boots. However, there are now Dr. Martens for women.", "Since its founding, the brand has extended the line to include other styles of shoes as well. There are now sandals as well as Dr. Martens Chelsea boots that slip on without laces, platforms, Mary Jane's, heels, and a line of Dr. Martens fur lined boots,\xa0all of which can be found for less during a Dr. Martens sale!", "Dr. Martens kid's boots come in sizes from infant to big kids. This product line has winter boots, sandals, and all of the classic designs. Using a Dr. Martens promo code makes it easy for your child to be stylish and comfortable without spending a lot of money every few months when they grow.", "Dr. Martens voucher codes work for most shoe styles. It's essential to check the fine print and be sure your Dr. Martens coupon correctly discounts your dream boot, otherwise, keep your eyes open for the Dr. Martens Cyber Monday sale or one of their limited-time promotions to save.", 'When you buy a pair of Dr. Martens, you are joining a tradition and tribe much larger than yourself. Luckily, Dr. Martens coupon codes make it easier to afford the perfect pair that fits both your look and budget.\xa0', 'You can also easily connect with the customer service team to make your experience even better. They are available by phone, email, or online chat six days a week, or you may also stop into your local Dr. Martens store for in-person assistance.', 'The Dr. Martens return policy is straightforward to navigate as well: you can return unworn shoes in their original packaging within 30 days of the purchase date. Shipping labels cost seven dollars. Dr. Martens takes that amount out of the refund that you receive. Dr. Martens for sale in their clearance section\xa0and shoes purchased using a Dr. Martens discount code are still eligible for returns.', "Even though these boots no longer come with a lifetime warranty, they remain quality footwear worth your investment. A cushioned sole can help your body feel healthy for the long term, even when you spend loads of time on your feet at work or festivals. Combine the longevity of the shoe with Dr. Martens promo codes, or their huge Dr. Martens Black Friday sale,\xa0and you'll be confident in your purchase.", "Dr. Martens discounts don't take away from the prestige or recognition of the shoe. Shopping at the Dr. Martens website means that you can join the huge community of fans that love their footwear; plus, with our Dr. Martens promos, you can do so for less."]

['Reward yourself with cutting-edge innovation by shopping with Dell. Fueled by the desire to drive human progress through smart technological solutions, Dell believes in cultivating big ideas through its large product lineup. You’ll find only the best, award-winning Dell laptops right here; do your part in changing the digital landscape with Bluetooth capability, Alienware gaming software, and powerful VMware solutions.', 'Choose your perfect computer with the assistance of Dell support, and once you’re ready, use our Dell coupon codes or a Dell discount code and see how you can achieve more and realize your dreams through the power of technology.', 'There are a variety of ways to save on laptops, desktops, PCs, and more from Dell. To get started, subscribe to the newsletter for 10% off your first purchase. You can then also take advantage of sales, promo codes, and financing deals to get the lowest price!', 'Shop a little differently and browse through Dell refurbished laptops, tablets, and more for high-performing technology at a fraction of the original cost. Visually and diagnostically inspected to ensure only the best quality items are being sold, you can be confident knowing that you are getting like-new products despite the super-low Dell outlet price tag.', 'Purchase Dell laptops that will let you do more for less; there’s no need to wait for Dell sales when you can find a Dell deal any time of year by shopping refurbished.\xa0', 'Upgrade your device to the latest tech with our Dell coupons and shop for the accompanying Dell computer accessories guilt-free! Never miss out when you browse with one of our deals on your next laptop or desktop; when you use these Dell promo codes, all you have to do is watch the savings roll in!', "It's easy and free to join Dell Rewards! When you shop trending deals on Dell laptops, browse for your next Alienware gaming PC, or look for the right Dell parts, you can earn 3% back in rewards with free expedited delivery! Make sure you sign up for coupons by\xa0email so you never miss out on Dell TV deals\xa0again.", "Once you rack up those Dell Advantage\xa0rewards, you can select from a wide range of award-winning monitors, PC's, and accessories along with audio and TV essentials. You'll also get early access to Dell sale alerts, exclusive Dell coupon codes, and so much more just by signing up.", 'When you’re shopping for new Dell computers, consider recycling your old devices so they can breathe new life as something different. From unwanted computers to game consoles and ink cartridges, it’s free to recycle your unwanted tech with the Dell trade-in program: just print a prepaid shipping label, box up your items, and drop them off at your local mailing center. Be sure to delete any remaining data and package your items carefully so they stay safe during transportation.', 'Make room for your new Dell Inspiron, Dell XPS or Dell Chromebook by recycling your old technology and shop Dell deals or the Dell clearance section to replace them for less. Once you choose the perfect new computer, be sure to check out using one of our Dell promo codes or Dell discounts to shop the best accessories and still stay within your budget.', "Now that you've picked out the perfect laptop, desktop, or tablet, you'll need some accessories to elevate your experience and make your purchase stretch even further. Shop for Dell diagnostics to help clean up your computer, a Dell laptop docking station for easy charging, or Dell Tech Direct for your business.\xa0\xa0From an Optiplex 990 to an Inspiron 5000 series, shop Dell desktop sales and choose a few key accessories to keep your system running smoothly for years to come. You may also request a Dell warranty check\xa0or a Dell warranty renewal to ensure that your products will last.\xa0", 'Wanting you to get the highest discounts on high-performance tech, if you find a lower price advertised elsewhere, Dell will match it. Just call their toll-free phone number, send them an email, or contact them through live chat and they’ll walk you through the process and get you back on track to saving big with our Dell coupons.', "If you're looking to upgrade your Dell laptop computer or Dell TV, but can't quite afford a whole new set up, there's no need to worry. With a Dell Preferred Account, you can update your technology with a monthly payment plan that fits you.\xa0", 'There’s never been a better time to save on a brand new Dell home computer, because during Black Friday\xa0sales, Dell discounts their most-popular and top-rated products to help you save big on the latest tech. Score the best prices of the year on Dell laptops on sale and so much more with free shipping on every Dell order and a quality experience from start to finish.', 'Although their Black Friday\xa0ad is usually released far in advice, make sure you look closely at the items you want, as lots of discounts start on specific days and times! The best discounts are of course found on Black Friday\xa0itself, including some with mystery pricing, so you’ll have to set your alarm and visit their website to see exactly what they have planned in terms of Dell doorbuster deals. From the classic Inspiron laptop to discounted McAfee Antivirus software, it’s easy to see why Dell Black Friday deals are a must-see in 2022!']

['Shop all of your pet’s favorite food, toys, treats, and supplies at amazing prices with Chewy. They measure their success by the happiness of the people and pets they serve every day, so they are constantly finding new outside-the-box ways to delight, surprise, and thank loyal pet lovers.', 'Explore all of your favorite brands in one convenient place either online or with their mobile app. Owned by PetSmart, Chewy is working to become the most trusted and convenient destination for all of your pet-related needs.', 'With our selection of Chewy promo codes and Chewy coupons, you can find all of your pet’s essentials in one place at an even more affordable price.', 'Tap into a better pet shopping experience with the new Chewy app, the best way to shop all the top pet brands right at your fingertips. Browse thousands of your favorite products, instantly search for your desired items, and check out straight from your phone. It’s everything you love about Chewy.com but in your pocket!\xa0', 'Customize your Autoship all in one convenient location; easily delay your order or schedule it to ship immediately from wherever you are. Read Chewy reviews, shop the Chewy pharmacy, and watch for Chewy deals on the go. Shop with a Chewy new customer coupon, or choose one of our many Chewy discount codes, and get great savings right from your phone.', 'Discover the best way to shop at Chewy by choosing Autoship on your next order: customize delivery dates so you get the perfect items for your pet right when you need them without a second thought. Running low or still have plenty of food? Simply pick a new shipping date that works better for you. You can stop your Autoship whenever you need to without any cancellation fees or catches.', 'Save 35% on your first Autoship order simply by adding your pet’s favorite food, toys, and more to your cart and selecting the Autoship option. Just wait for the shipping confirmation email and watch for the Chewy box at your door. Select brands are an extra 5-10% off with Autoship— get your next order of Chewy cat toys or Chewy dog food lower than retail price and use the money you’ve saved on more great items for your pet. Combine this with one of our Chewy coupon codes to get maximum savings every time.', 'Always treat your pet to something exciting with our Chewy promo codes! For the best nutrition, healthcare, and other supplies, browse through our Chewy coupons and select something like 10% off discounts for ultimate savings!', "When you check out the Today's Deals section at Chewy, you'll find prices you love on favorites for any pet! From a no-pull harness for dogs, the\xa0perfect hamsters cage for a new friend, tri-heart plus to keep your furry friend healthy, or the cutest set of pajamas for dogs, you won't find it at a better price— unless you use a Chewy promo code, of course! BOGO offers are another great way to save. They often release discounts to score free treats, food, toys, and more when you purchase a certain quantity.\xa0", 'At Chewy, they strive to deliver the best products with the best service every single time. Happy customers are their top priority and their team members are passionate about assisting pet owners in finding the best products for their furry friends. Their experts are available 24/7 to answer questions through email or their toll-free phone number.\xa0', 'Currently, Chewy accepts Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. Chewy Flat rate shipping is $4.95 and orders ship for free over $49. While Chewy does not price match, you can shop using one of our Chewy promos or Chewy discounts to get the best savings on your pet’s favorite food and toys.', 'Chewy returns are simple: if you’re not 100% absolutely satisfied with your pet supplies, you can return them without issue within 365 days of purchase. Just contact their customer service team and they will provide you with instructions for returning your items. Unfortunately, Chewy does not accept returns or exchanges on prescription medications at this time. If the medication you received is incorrect or damaged they will gladly exchange it or provide you with a refund for the inconvenience.', 'Pet parents know that the holiday season means it’s time to treat their furry friends too, and by shopping the Chewy Black Friday\xa0sale, you can browse the best pet deals from the comfort of your home. With their extensive collection of discounts on a variety of pet supplies including food, bedding, grooming items, dog toys, cat carriers, and so much more, you won’t have to think twice about your pet’s wishlist.', 'Liking to keep things simple for your convenience, Chewy usually offers sitewide savings up to 55% off in addition to free one or two-day shipping on orders of $49 or more. As they are an online-only retailer, you never have to worry about fighting crowds for doorbuster deals, and they often extend these great discounts Cyber Monday\xa0as well. You’ll never miss out on a good deal with Forbes, so if you’re looking to pick up a few pet essentials, check back here and see what we’ve dug up for Black Friday!']

It’s one of a tiny batch of credit cards aimed at those without great credit that don’t require an upfront security deposit.', 'Up to 2% Reward Rate', '
Earn 2% cash back at Gas Stations and Restaurants on up to $1,000 in combined purchases each quarter. Plus, earnRead More ', 'Cashback Match™', '$0', '23.24% Variable', '
						
							New/Rebuilding Credit													', 'In the secured credit world, the Discover it® Secured Credit Card stands above the competition. With an unlimited 1% cash back rate on all purchases, plus 2% cash back at gas stations and restaurants on up to $1,000 in combined purchases each quarter, no penalty APR and no annual fee, we love this card for those who need to rebuild their credit. The matching cash back reward at the end of your first year is a sweet bonus.', 'The Chase Freedom Flex℠, launched with a splash in late 2020. When paired with a premium Chase Ultimate Rewards®-earning card like the Chase Sapphire Preferred® Card, Chase Sapphire Reserve® or Ink Business Preferred® Credit Card, it can earn powerful Chase Ultimate Rewards points. Even as a standalone cash back card, it’s tough to beat considering it also has no annual fee.', 'Rewards: 5% cash back on up to $1,500 in categories that rotate quarterly (requires activation), 5% on travel purchased through Chase Ultimate Rewards®, 3% on dining and drugstores and 1% on all other purchases', 'Welcome Offer: $200 bonus after spending $500 on purchases in the first 3 months from account opening', 'Annual Fee: $0', 'Other Benefits and Drawbacks: The Chase Freedom Flex℠ packs a huge punch for a card without an annual fee. The biggest downside to this card? You’ll have to remember to activate the quarterly bonus categories and track how much you’ve spent because the rotating categories have a $1,500 cap—at least if you’re planning to optimize your spending.', 'You can also benefit from complementary cell phone insurance protection when you pay your monthly cell phone bill with your card. Balance transfers made within 120 days qualify for the intro rate and fee of 3% then a fee of up to 5%, with a minimum of $5 applies', 'Welcome Offer: $200 cash rewards bonus after spending $1,000 in purchases in the first 3 months', 'Annual Fee: $0', 'Other Benefits and Drawbacks: The Wells Fargo Active Cash℠ Card offers cell phone protection when you pay your cell phone bill with the card each month. column32: 'Most credit cards calculate interest using the average daily balance method

column73: 'There are several steps you can take to try to improve your credit score. First

column75: every time will have the single biggest impact on your score. After payment history
column76: the next biggest factor in your credit score is the amount of debt you have. Since credit reporting agencies don’t have your income information
column77: they use something called “credit utilization” instead of a debt-to-income ratio.'
column78: 'Credit utilization is the amount of debt you owe relative to the amount of credit you have. So if you have a balance of $3

column82: both what you owe and how much you have available. It’s typically suggested that utilization of 30% or below should be the goal.'

column111: 'A balance transfer card is one that offers a low or 0% APR for transfers made to the card for an introductory period of time. After that introductory period
column112: the card’s standard variable APR will typically apply. There may be a balance transfer fee to shift debt to a balance transfer card

column114: 'A low interest credit card is one that has a low ongoing interest rate

column116: this may be a more beneficial option since over time
column117: the interest charges will be less than on a card with a higher interest rate. This is different from a card with a 0% APR in that a low interest card’s rate is ongoing and doesn’t expire after a promotional period.'
column118: 'A 0% APR credit card is one that offers an introductory 0% interest period on either purchases
column119: balance transfers or both. Think of a 0% APR offer like an interest-free loan with an expiration date. If used responsibly
column120: it can give you a cushion of time to pay off what you owe
column121: without accumulating additional finance charges. But also be aware that the zero-interest period of time doesn’t last forever and when it expires your balance will accrue interest at the card’s standard variable rate.'
